meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>normal</kanji> <kanji>steps</kanji> are the ones that are totally <vocabulary>usual</vocabulary>. They're the ones you <vocabulary>usually</vocabulary> do, unlike those weird not usual steps.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
